alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 11:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns and central Clay Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1101 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Green Cove Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach, Picolata, Switzerland and South Ponte Vedra. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
